channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @benj_fry @egrattan Please take me off the cc list. Thanks.
How to write a linter using tree-sitter in an hour. https://t.co/BU2UHz7xXF
@om @LAmag plus there's almost no distribution for half the movies that are nominated.
@KenSmith @dwaynebetts i bet it has a lot of vowels in it.
any network that doesn't allow peering is going to be under the same kind of political pressure twitter is to ban unpopular people.
The Pandemic Isnâ€™t Over Yet, But Congress Is Willing to Gamble That It Is. https://t.co/vBDzO8b8RO
Breakthrough infections raise health, death risk; vaccine passports without testing allow cases to be missed. https://t.co/0dJoLBCO5l

"The Constitution is not a suicide pact" expresses the belief that constitutional restrictions on governmental power must be balanced against the need for survival of the state and its people. https://t.co/WmsMZ2mEsF
@Redpainter1 this person works for putin. don't push his message. please.

Defunding Fox News is an essential first step to maing America strong. President Biden could declare an emergency executive order. Say the truth about Fox. They are deliberately weakening America when we need to be strong. We need to sanction Fox News like we sanction Russia.
maing == making
Two comments to the commenters:
1. The constitution is not a suicide pact.
2. I pay for Fox News because I have a cable subscription. Let's start there. I don't want to pay that money. An executive order could say I don't have to.
@kevinhughes heh. jokes do not work on twitter. have a great day. ;-)
@KenSmith @Kasparov63 Exactly. What we learned is that our president has cojones. It's about fucking time.
Whenever a pundit criticizes Biden on TV, a little voice in my head asks: "Compared to what?" We've had the comparison, you know. Four harrowing years of it.
@kevinhughes are you logged into the nyt when you use wordle? even if you aren't you've been tagged by so many cookies, they know who you are.
@kevinhughes you think the nyt isn't tracking everything you do in wordle?
@kevinhughes i have a lot of computers. ;-)

1/7 So much disappointment in what Biden said about Putin. As I've said, I don't care. Putin has to go, whether or not Biden said it out loud.
2/7 But there's a much more dangerous despot-in-waiting here in the good old US of A.
3/7 He tried to overthrow the government and came incredibly close to doing it.
4/7 I remember while it was going on, wondering if the entire US Congress was being executed while we were watching the riot. If the attackers had been somewhat better organized, that's exactly what would have been going on. And how would our country ever recover from that.
5/7 Aside: No one scanned them for weapons as they entered the Capitol.
6/7 The coup didn't work, but that was only luck. The organizers are still free, and they're getting ready for Coup II and this one is going to work. They're using our own laws to pre-rig the outcome of the next national election.
7/7 So to President Biden, who was refreshingly honest and open about Putin (and I don't think it was a gaffe, btw) what are we going to do about the Putinites in America?
PS: The only punishment for Trump was he lost his TWTR. https://t.co/QDsNjpi4Mz
PPS: That the Capitol was completely undefended can't have been an accident. I wasn't born yesterday and neither were you. If that had happened in another country would have believed there wasn't help on the inside?
@jeremyzilar wow even more impressive. when i guessed correctly i had four letters and i knew the last letter.

If you haven't solved today's Wordle -- this is a spoiler. I was pretty sure I had the answer to today's Wordle, so I did a screen recording of the reveal, to capture the animation, so I could experience it over and over. Now you can too. ðŸ˜€ https://t.co/wC8QMGFIQa
@jeremyzilar wow that's pretty good, you only had three letters. but you knew the last one.

@Quigs8816 This is a bit different from Iraq. Putin actually has WMDs and has threatened to use them. Yeah it has to be our policy that he goes. Or else there's a new balance of power between the US and Russia.
@Quigs8816 We're just waiting to see what happens in Ukraine before we figure out what the new balance is. But we can't ever "do business" with a Russian leader who threatens to use nukes, unless we're willing to make that threat too.
